trans-unit.source: The SelectingProviderEventArgs class supplies values to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event handler.
trans-unit.target: La classe SelectingProviderEventArgs fornisce i valori per il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider>gestore dell'evento.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider>

trans-unit.source: You create a <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event handler to select the role provider at run time.
trans-unit.target: Si crea un <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider>gestore dell'evento per selezionare il provider di ruoli in fase di esecuzione.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> class raises the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event when either the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.IsCurrentUserInRole%2A> method or the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.GetRolesForCurrentUser%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> class is called.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService>classe genera il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider>evento quando sia il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.IsCurrentUserInRole%2A>(metodo) o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.GetRolesForCurrentUser%2A>metodo la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService>classe è detta.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.GetRolesForCurrentUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.IsCurrentUserInRole%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService>

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.User%2A> property to retrieve information about the logged-in user.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.User%2A>proprietà per recuperare informazioni relative all'utente connesso.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve role information through a non-default role provider, set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.ProviderName%2A> property to the name of the role provider that you want the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> object to use.
trans-unit.target: Per recuperare le informazioni sui ruoli tramite un provider di ruoli non predefinito, impostare il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.ProviderName%2A>proprietà sul nome del provider di ruoli che si desidera il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService>oggetto da usare.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.ProviderName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the role provider to use for retrieving the user's roles.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il provider di ruoli da utilizzare per recuperare i ruoli dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: You use the ProviderName property to set the role provider during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà ProviderName per impostare il provider di ruoli durante la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider>evento.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider>

trans-unit.source: The name of the role provider that is used to get the user's roles.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del provider di ruoli che viene usato per ottenere i ruoli dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: You use the User property to retrieve information about the user during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà dell'utente per recuperare informazioni relative all'utente durante la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider>evento.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the authenticated user.
